text: Can’t you save it as a global group then select “make local copy”?
wow, that’s a pretty darn good solution.

Hey all–got a slight issue here: I copied a module with a dependent style sheet over through the portal. I was moving files out of folders and the .css file got deleted. I deleted the module as well afterwards. When I copy the module over again, the module does not get transferred. Only the .css file. Any workarounds?
Hmmm. I recopied again and the module showed up.
The 3rd time I sent it through I did not copy the stylesheet, just the module itself (in case anyone else has had this problem).
